name: (De)Constructor
description:
(De)Constructor is a game where the players first create a game, and then play it against each other! It is a two player local multiplayer game that can be played with gamepads and/or a keyboard.

You pick the rules, including win conditions, gravity, and more! Then, you pick abilities from a common pool. With 24 rules and 23 abilities which interact with each other in unique ways the possibilities are near endless!
